original_text: A man might lie with a woman. If semen comes out of him, they are both unclean. They must wash their bodies. They will be unclean until evening.
korean_text: 남녀가 동침하여 설정하였거든 둘 다 물로 몸을 씻을 것이며 저녁까지 부정하리라

sentences.original_text: A man might lie with a woman.
sentences.korean_translation: 한 남자가 한 여자와 동침할 수 있다.

sentences.original_text: If semen comes out of him,
They will be unclean until evening.
